name: Redirect to EUDI Wallet for successful authentication
scenarioId: android/Age_verification_using_age_over_18_pseudonym_attestation_POC_16/AV_POC-Presenting_Age_Verification_attestation-remote_same_device_42/ageVerificationAttestationSameDevice:Redirect to EUDI Wallet for successful authentication
methodName: Redirect to EUDI Wallet for successful authentication

testSteps.description: Given the Relying Party service redirects the user to the EUDI Wallet
When the user authenticates successfully in the EUDI Wallet
Then the EUDI Wallet presents a screen to inform the user about the Age Verification Attestation request

userStory.narrative:
As a user of the EUDI Wallet
  I want to present my Age Verification Attestation to a requestor Relying Party residing on the same device
  So that I can prove that I am over 18 years old without revealing my age or any other personal information

title: Redirect to EUDI Wallet for successful authentication
